website_summaries.verdict: A great, portable cooler, but other ones from the Hopper series cost less and hold more.
pros: A very portable YETI that holds up to a dozen 12-ounce drinks and keeps them cold
cons: Cold retention is not as good as in larger coolers and it is very expensive when you consider the small size

customer_reviews.title: The Flip is the perfect cooler for small sports type cars and even fits ...
customer_reviews.text: The Flip 12 will hold 12 bottles of beer and then some plus enough ice to keep them cold for over a day. The Flip is the perfect cooler for small sports type cars and even fits on the luggage rack of motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as the big Yeti coolers. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as the big Yeti coolers. My husband uses it as a lunchbox, and he once left it in his truck over a weekend, and the inside was still cold when he got it out. A pricey item but does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn J Thompson

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product that can be used by everyone
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new Yeti so much lighter than his original Yeti cooler. Even though it's light it still keeps his lunch cold n water bottle frozen. A wonderful product that can be used by everyone.

customer_reviews.title: Some Legends are Urban Myths
customer_reviews.text: The Yeti is legendary, and I am willing to pay for quality, but sadly, for me, it was not even close to being worth the money. It was a legendary bad value. You can literally hire a sherpa in Nepal for a month for the price of this small cooler. Spend your money more wisely.
customer_reviews.author: Customer T of DC

customer_reviews.title: High Price for High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction. The Yeti Hopper Flip 12 cooler is assembled well and performs much better than my Arctic Zone cooler. Although its price is rather high, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cooler, the perfect size for drinks and snacks for 1 or 2 people. My only complaint is the zipper - it is very stiff. The cooler comes with a tube of zipper lube, but we are having a hard time making it work smoothly. Hoping it will get easier with repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Susant

customer_reviews.title: Save your money buy a Coleman
customer_reviews.text: My Coleman I bought at a Walmart holds ice much longer and was a tenth of the cost the only nice thing about this cooler is it's size
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: I wanted it to be as good as the rest of my yetis but this cooler ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it to be as good as the rest of my yetis but this cooler falls short.. It is lightweight and durable I love the concept but doesn't hold ice long and is way overpriced. It will still go with me on lighttrips but cheaper coolers work better for sure
customer_reviews.author: Richyrich

customer_reviews.title: Great carry size cooler
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice a week and does everything I need it to. You can fit 12 bottles or 15 cans but you need to follow yeti's 2:1 ice to can if you want the ice to last for days. The yeti ice 4lb brick fits perfectly in the bottom. I added the side kick for things I don't want to get wet. This is way more useful than the yeti roadie 20 which ways 20lbs. My only regret is mine doesn't have the top handle they added that later.
customer_reviews.author: Blake T

product_meta.title: YETI Hopper Flip 12 Can Portable Cooler, Field Tan / Blaze Orange
product_meta.description: Yeti Coolers Inc. Hopper Flip 12-Can Cooler in field tan won't slow you down, whether hunting, kayaking, spending time in the field or rushing to the sports game. The compact, cubed body allows for ultimate portability without sacrificing durability. Features a wide-mouth opening for convenient loading, leak-proof Hydrology zipper, and Cold Cell insulation to keep ice, drink and food cold for days.
feature_bullets: The Hopper Flip 12 has ColdCell Insulation, a closed-cell foam that offers superior cold-holding to ordinary soft coolers, with a capacity of up to 12 cans plus ice
The Hopper Flip 12 features a 100% leakproof HydroLok Zipper and the wide-mouth opening means great accessibility and visibility to contents
The DryHide Shell is waterproof and resistant to mildew, punctures, and abrasions so it will hold its own when faced with the hazards of the wild
The only personal cooler that’s game for full days in the tree stand, early mornings in the duck boat, or afternoons on the water
The Hopper Flip 12 dimensions are 12 5/8 in long x 10 in wide x 11 ½ in high and an empty weight of 3.1 lbs.
